constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: KEYACO Kingston Old Town Conservation Area
KEYACH Kingston Town Centre Key Area of Change
CONARA Kingston Old Town Conservation Area

description: Re-fit of a grade 2 listed unit including reception counter, bench seating, connections to drainage, electrical installation, ventilation and air conditioning systems.
decision_conditions: The development hereby permitted shall be commenced within 3 years from the date of this decision.Reason: In order to comply with Section 18 or 74 (3) of the Planning (Listed Buildings and Conservation Areas) Act 1990. (As amended).

The development to which this permission relates shall be carried out in accordance with the materials specified on the approved plans and on the application form unless otherwise agreed in writing by the local planning authority.Reason: To ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development, in accordance with policy D3 of the London Plan 2021 and policies CS8 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

Site Address - As this is a discharge of condition application the Site Address must match that of the original application, not the newly created address. Please amend the Application Form to 411 Ewell Road

Fee - I acknowledge receipt of your payment for £86, the fee required for this application is £ 298, therefore please forward the outstanding balance of £212 as soon as possible.Note: Payment can be made online via the Kingston council website, or via our Contact Centre on 020 8547 5002
